title: Chloe Ferry looks worse for wear after charity event
text:
We’ve all been there (Picture: Splash)

Chloe Ferry is a professional party girl. having starred on Geordie Shore since 2015.

But it appears the Elbrook Cash and Carry charity dinner on Thursday night was too much, even for her.

The 24-year-old looked all partied out as she left Chak89 restaurant in Mitchim a tad worse for wear.

We have all been there.

Chloe wore a pretty daring bodysuit (Picture: Andy Barnes / BACKGRID)

Chloe was joined by Towie’s Chloe and Demi (Picture: Andy Barnes / BACKGRID)

Oh what a night (Picture: BACKGRID)

Chloe attended the charity do in a skintight nude bodysuit, and while Chloe looked gorgeous as always, the super revealing outfit was bound to cause trouble.

The reality star paired the leotard with lace-up heels, poker straight hair and a nude lip, and enjoyed the do with pals including Pete Wicks and Chloe and Demi Sims.

And it seems the free bar was in full flow, as the Newcastle lass seemed very ready for bed at the end of the night.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Chloe was seen sitting on the stairs of the venue with her head in her hands as she clutched onto a glass of wine, before she left the restaurant looking a bit bleary-eyed.

And then the night turned (Picture: BACKGRID)

She still held onto her glass, though (Picture: Splash News)

We knew that bodysuit would be an issue (Picture: Splash News)

Her outfit got a mind of its own, threatening a bit of a wardrobe malfunction, and Chloe left Mitchim slumped against the window of her taxi.

All that’s missing is a McDonald’s bag and it would be be the true great British night out.

Chloe has been a hellraiser on Geordie Shore since series 10, and currently appears alongside Nathan Henry, Abbie Holborn, Sam Gowland, Alex MacPherson, Beau Brennan, Tahlia Chung, Bethan Kershaw and Natalie Phillips.

Chloe knows how to party (Picture: Splash News)

Relatable (Picture: BACKGRID)

Chloe looked pretty tuckered out (Picture: BACKGRID)

And the star is involved in major drama involving her ex Sam, following their split this summer.

Sam made it very clear he is moving on from his ex by getting the tattoo of Chloe’s face on his leg covered up with a giant inking of a bear.

The former Love Island star said: ‘Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

The 24-year-old had his then-girlfriend’s face tattooed on his thigh on the MTV series Just Tattoo Of Us – when Chloe decided she wanted to ‘c*** block him for life’.

This kind of backfired when she realised Sam had chosen a sweet, and tiny, cat tattoo for her ankle.

Sam seethed at the time: ‘Next time you go to get filler or surgery on your face it’s not going to f***ing look like you.’

Come to think of it, their split is probably for the best.
